entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 11.

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of light snow. Low plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy overnight with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CDT Thursday 11 May 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow in the morning then 30 percent chance of rain showers late in the morning and early afternoon. Clearing late in the afternoon. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light late in the afternoon. High 8. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CDT Thursday 11 May 2023
